Don't provide backward compatibility for deleted/updated fields.
Update unit tests if needed
Comments guidelines:
Section Headers → # ==================== Section Name ==================== (20 equals signs each side, Title Case)
Subsection Headers → # --- Subsection Name --- (three dashes each side, Title Case)
Inline Comments → # Explanation here (Sentence case, no period, placed above code)
Docstrings standard:
"""
Brief description.

Extended explanation of behavior and purpose.

Args:
param: Description with examples (e.g., [1, 2, 3])

Returns:
Detailed description of return value structure

Raises:
ErrorType: When this error occurs (if applicable)
"""
